text: This is a very long subtitle text that should test how the video processor handles multiple lines and word wrapping. It contains a lot of text that should be displayed over a longer period to ensure readability.

Here's another long subtitle that includes technical terms and complex concepts that need to be displayed clearly: video processing, encoding, compression, aspect ratio, and other technical specifications that should be easy to read.

The final long subtitle demonstrates how the system handles multiple paragraphs of text with different formatting requirements, including numbers (123), special characters (!@#), and various punctuation marks that should all be rendered correctly.
